task: Define and implement a Web3 metadata schema for Crew-7 AI Crew NFTs

context.goal: Each Crew (full 7-agent team) and each individual Agent (Orchestrator or Specialist) can be represented as an NFT-like digital asset with on-chain or off-chain metadata.
context.usage: Metadata will be used in marketplace UI, Web3 minting, analytics, and portfolio evolution (XP/level).
context.standards: Base it on common NFT metadata standards (e.g. OpenSea metadata) plus custom Crew-7 fields.

deliverables: JSON schema example for a Crew NFT and an Agent NFT
(Optional) Solidity struct sketch or comment block for future contract implementation

shared_fields.name: Human-friendly name of the crew or agent
shared_fields.description: Rich text describing the role, specialization, and mission history.
shared_fields.image: URL to Hybrid-C portrait or card render
shared_fields.external_url: Link to Crew-7 dashboard profile page
shared_fields.attributes: Array of trait objects in standard { trait_type, value } format.

crew_specific_fields.crew_id: Unique internal Crew-7 ID (string or UUID).
crew_specific_fields.orchestrator_ref: Agent NFT tokenId or internal ID of orchestrator.
crew_specific_fields.specialists_ref: Array of up to 6 agent IDs or tokenIds.

agent_specific_fields.skills: Array of skill tags, e.g. ['TypeScript', 'Prompt Chaining', 'Pricing Models'].
agent_specific_fields.primary_model: LLM or model ID used most often.
agent_specific_fields.linked_crew_ids: Array of crew_id values this agent participates in.

typescript_interfaces_prompt.copilot_instruction: Create TypeScript interfaces `CrewNftMetadata` and `AgentNftMetadata` that extend a base `BaseNftMetadata` with fields described above. Also export a helper `createCrewNftMetadata(crew: CrewMarketplaceItem): CrewNftMetadata` that maps the marketplace data model into the NFT metadata model.

crew_example.name: Crew-7 // Atlas Dev Squad
crew_example.description: A Prime-level autonomous dev crew led by the Orchestrator Atlas, specialized in SaaS MVPs, API backends, and infra-as-code.

agent_example.name: Atlas // Orchestrator
agent_example.description: Prime Orchestrator of the Atlas Dev Squad. Specializes in task decomposition, orchestration, and risk-aware planning.

solidity_struct_hint.copilot_instruction: Add a commented Solidity struct sketch like `struct CrewMetaRef { uint256 tokenId; string crewId; uint32 level; uint32 xp; uint16 missionsCompleted; uint16 successRateBps; }` for future on-chain compact storage. Do not fully implement the contract yet, just prepare the data structure.

acceptance_criteria: Example JSON metadata files validate against the interfaces.
Mapping helper from marketplace model to NFT metadata exists.
Code is documented with comments explaining each major field.
